title: Macron says France "finalizing" plans to ease restrictions for vaccinated travelers
content:
1. Macron says France "finalizing" plans to ease restrictions for vaccinated travelers  CBS News
  2. French president foresees some summer tourists in Paris  The Associated Press
  3. Macron says nations must 'define red lines' with Russia  Yahoo News
  4. Macron says France "finalizing" plans to ease restrictions for vaccinated American travelers  Face the Nation
  5. France Set To Start Lifting Restrictions for Vaccinated Foreign Travelers in May  TravelPulse
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
